summary.p: Lighting effect creates an image that appears to be an illuminated non-reflective surface. This effect uses the alpha channel as a height map, and lights it with a point light source.

p.i: Supported by Win2D but not Windows.UI.Composition.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Point-diffuse lighting effect.
